text: Max Houser (c. 1900 – August 5, 1928) was an American football player and coach. He served as the head football coach at the University of Redlands in Redlands, California in 1926, compiling a record of 0–9, and Army and Navy Academy High School in San Diego in 1927. Houser died from drowning in 1928. ==Head coaching record== ===College=== ==References== Category:Year of birth missing Category:1928 deaths Category:Notre Dame Fighting Irish football players Category:Redlands Bulldogs football coaches Category:High school football coaches in California Category:Deaths by drowning
title: Max Houser
